title: What are some topics in contemporary anthropology? - Quora

response.answer_text: -Globalization, centralization and regulation, and the convergence of humankind.-Declining marriage rates. Future of social structure.-Effect of technology on society.-Overpopulation-humanitarian efforts.-religion in the modern world-growing income inequality and the rise of the elite class-Evolution (by mixing and invention) of world cultures and cultural globalization-corporatism power shift.-3d printing-bitcoins
